question: What is your refund policy?
answer: Our refund policy allows returns within 30 days with a valid receipt. Refunds will be processed within 5-7 business days.

question: How do I contact support?
answer: You can reach support via email at support@company.com or call +1234567890. Live chat support is also available 24/7.

question: How do I reset my password?
answer: To reset your password, click on 'Forgot Password' on the login page. You'll receive an email with a reset link.

question: How do I change my email address?
answer: Log in to your account, go to 'Settings' > 'Account Information' and update your email address. You may need to verify your new email.

question: What payment methods do you accept?
answer: We accept Visa, MasterCard, American Express, PayPal, and Apple Pay.

question: How do I update my billing information?
answer: You can update your billing details by navigating to 'Settings' > 'Billing' and entering your new payment details.

question: Why was my payment declined?
answer: Your payment may be declined due to insufficient funds, incorrect card details, or restrictions from your bank. Please check your details and try again.

question: How do I cancel my subscription?
answer: To cancel your subscription, go to 'Settings' > 'Subscription' and click 'Cancel Subscription'. You will retain access until the end of the billing period.

question: Do you offer a free trial?
answer: Yes, we offer a 7-day free trial. You can sign up without being charged. After the trial, you will be automatically billed unless you cancel.

question: Can I reactivate a canceled subscription?
answer: Yes, you can reactivate your subscription anytime by going to 'Settings' > 'Subscription' and selecting 'Reactivate'.

question: How do I track my order?
answer: Once your order is shipped, you will receive a tracking link via email. You can also track your order under 'My Orders' on your profile.

question: What is your shipping policy?
answer: We offer standard (5-7 days) and express (2-3 days) shipping. Shipping fees depend on your location and are calculated at checkout.

question: What should I do if my order is delayed?
answer: If your order is delayed beyond the estimated delivery date, please contact our support team with your order ID for assistance.

question: How do I return an item?
answer: To return an item, go to 'Orders' > 'Request Return'. Print the provided return label and ship the item back to us.

question: What products do you offer?
answer: We offer a wide range of products, including electronics, home essentials, clothing, and digital services. Visit our website for more details.

question: How do I set up my new device?
answer: Please refer to the user manual provided in the package. You can also check our setup guide in the 'Support' section.

question: Why is my device not turning on?
answer: Make sure your device is charged and the power button is functioning. If the issue persists, try resetting the device.

question: How do I update my software?
answer: To update your software, go to 'Settings' > 'Software Update' and check for available updates.

question: Is my personal information secure?
answer: Yes, we use industry-standard encryption to protect your personal data. We never share your information without your consent.

question: How do I enable two-factor authentication (2FA)?
answer: Go to 'Settings' > 'Security' and enable Two-Factor Authentication. You will need to enter a verification code sent to your phone.

question: How do I report a fraudulent transaction?
answer: If you notice an unauthorized charge, contact support immediately at fraud@company.com. We will investigate the issue.

question: What is your data privacy policy?
answer: We comply with GDPR and other data protection regulations. You can read our full policy at www.company.com/privacy-policy.

question: Do you store my payment information?
answer: We do not store your payment details directly. All transactions are securely processed by our payment gateway.

question: Can I request a copy of my data?
answer: Yes, you can request a copy of your data by contacting our privacy team at privacy@company.com.

question: How can I delete my account?
answer: To delete your account, go to 'Settings' > 'Account' and select 'Delete Account'. Note that this action is irreversible.

question: Do you offer customer support in multiple languages?
answer: Yes, we provide customer support in English, Spanish, French, German, and Mandarin.

question: How do I report a bug or issue?
answer: Please report bugs by going to 'Help' > 'Report a Problem' or emailing support@company.com with a detailed description.

question: How can I upgrade my plan?
answer: To upgrade your plan, go to 'Settings' > 'Subscription' and select 'Upgrade'. Changes will take effect immediately.

question: What is the difference between basic and premium plans?
answer: Our basic plan offers limited features, while the premium plan includes advanced tools, higher storage, and priority support.

question: Do you offer enterprise solutions?
answer: Yes, we offer enterprise packages with customized features and dedicated support. Contact sales@company.com for details.

question: How do I request a demo?
answer: To request a demo, visit our website and fill out the demo request form. A representative will contact you shortly.

question: Where can I find tutorials and user guides?
answer: You can find tutorials and guides in the 'Help Center' section of our website.

question: Can I integrate this service with third-party apps?
answer: Yes, our platform supports integrations with major third-party applications. Visit our API documentation for details.

question: How do I reset my device to factory settings?
answer: Go to 'Settings' > 'System' > 'Factory Reset'. This will erase all data on your device.

question: What should I do if my account is locked?
answer: If your account is locked due to multiple failed login attempts, reset your password or contact support.

question: How do I claim a warranty?
answer: Submit a warranty claim by providing proof of purchase and filling out the warranty request form on our website.

question: How do I contact the legal team?
answer: For legal inquiries, please email legal@company.com.

question: What security measures do you have in place?
answer: We use encryption, multi-factor authentication, and regular security audits to protect user data.

question: What happens if I forget my 2FA code?
answer: If you lose access to your 2FA code, you can use backup codes or contact support for identity verification.

question: How can I give feedback on the service?
answer: We value feedback! Submit your feedback via 'Settings' > 'Feedback' or email us at feedback@company.com.
